description: Montero and Ferrat finally meet up again and go to a local bar, which turns out to be empty except for a skin-headed bartender, Erik Martins, who has just finished taking a piss. Montero and Ferrat team up on Martinss dick, then fuck each other on the bar before Martins gets his chance with both of them.
title: Bar-Room Fuck: Andreas Montero, Anthony Ferrat, and Erik Martins
